key_takeaways: Solution: Use pre-built templates with libraries already installed (Difficulty: beginner)
Solution: Use Claude AI to troubleshoot and iterate through solutions (Difficulty: intermediate)
Strategy: Use AI tools to eliminate technical barriers and focus on building features
Startup Opportunity: App that converts podcast transcripts into startup idea presentations (Target: entrepreneurs and content creators)
